metadata.description: Before she can come home to the X-Men, Betsy Braddock has one final mission - settle the score once and for all with the man who's been hunting her across the multiverse. If she hopes to survive, Psylocke's going to have to use every weapon at her disposal...and possibly cross a line no X-Man ever has before!
metadata.name: X-Men: Sword of the Braddocks
